channel.title: race on rs.io
channel.description: Recent content in race on rs.io

item.title: Black progress
item.description: From 2001 to 2017, the incarceration rate for black men declined by 34 percent.

item.title: Diversity riddle
item.description: Between 2013 and 2016, 90% of Oracle’s hires were people of color.

item.title: Why shouldn't I have my own water fountain?
item.description: If anything, Thomas believes that the state should—where it can, within the law—support the separation of the races.
